name: @colabo-flow/service-audit
description: A ColaboFlow (CF) Audit service accepting (through gRPC) CF audits and storing them in MongoDB

scripts.prepare: colabo puzzles-offer; colabo puzzles-install; colabo puzzles-build; tsc
scripts.clean_full: rm -r node_modules/; rm -r dev_puzzles/*/*/node_modules; rm -r dev_puzzles/*/*/dist; rm -r dist/
